name: Galaxy Kart VR
description:
Put your VR headset on, grab the wheel and accelerate!
In a Galaxy full of crazy racers, an amazing championship
decides who is the best driver of all!

Not only the racers can get weapons in the tracks, but each one of them have individual skills!



In Galaxy Kart you will choose between many characters, each with their own special skills and ways of winning a race,
and use the items scattered on the track to stop your enemies from reaching the finish-line before you do!

As a famous non-kart racer almost said:
"you shall race on the beaches, shall race on the landing grounds, shall race in the fields,
in the streets, you shall race in the space, and shall never surrender!"
